name: Beany
description:
Lil' Beany encounters a bunch of criminals while walking home at midnight. Shoot them down and earn the highest score you can!

Desc:
Made this out of boredom and I want to try and see how far I can go within one day of production. After all, I've only made one game before, so this is enough for me to be proud of. All the components in this game are made by me, except for 1 soundtrack used in the start menu. I can't draw nor make music, enjoy.

How to play the game:
Dodge and shoot the enemies that are coming for you. They spawn randomly so be careful. Get the score up by 1 on each kill and get the highest score you can!

Bugs:
Too simple of a game to get bugs on...
